summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2667, for the improvement of East James Street, from 20th Avenue to 22nd Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks with all necessary crosswalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31584 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
